news.title: Tory MP and shadow minister Danny Kruger defects to Reform
news.summary: The East Wiltshire MP said the Conservatives were no longer the main party of opposition.

news.title: Starmer facing leadership questions after Mandelson sacking
news.summary: Some Labour MPs have become more vocal in their criticism of the prime minister after the departures of Angela Rayner and Peter Mandelson.

news.title: How Adolescence pulled off an Emmys sweep
news.summary: The Netflix drama, starring Owen Cooper, explored the impact of smartphones on teenagers.

news.title: Ricky Hatton's family pay tribute, saying his heart was as big as his smile
news.summary: Ricky Hatton's family pay tribute to the former world champion, who was found dead at the age of 46 at his home in Manchester on Sunday.

news.title: Bloody Sunday deaths 'unnecessary and gratuitous', court told
news.summary: The non-jury trial is taking place at Belfast Crown Court with the former soldier accused of two murders and five attempted murders.

news.title: Rubio meets Netanyahu to discuss fallout from Israel's Qatar strike
news.summary: Israel's strike targeting Hamas leaders in Doha last week drew international outrage and was publicly criticised by the US.

news.title: Charges dropped against two men accused of spying for China
news.summary: Christopher Cash, 30, and Christopher Berry, 33, had previously denied the allegations.

news.title: History-making wins and heartfelt thank yous - highlights from the ceremony in LA
news.summary: Host Nate Bargatze's plan to keep speeches snappy backfires and political statements take centre stage at the 77th Primetime Emmy Awards.

news.title: 'I'm just a mixed-race kid from flats in Kirkby', says Stephen Graham in acceptance speech
news.summary: Stephen Graham is emotional as he accepts an Emmy award for his role in the hit series Adolescence.

news.title: In pictures: Best looks from the Emmys red carpet in LA
news.summary: Sydney Sweeney, Jenna Ortega and Selena Gomez are among the stars who posed for pictures ahead of the event.
